data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sun, Ting, Zhang, Lv, Wang, An-Tai, Zhang, Yu (2015): Three new species of freshwater Macrostomum (Platyhelminthes, Macrostomida) from southern China. Zootaxa 4012 (1): 120-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.1.6
